lines.text: To this day the persecuted, the oppressed, the weary look upon our shore with eyes of hope.
Hitler had said no bomb will ever fall on German soil, but they were falling like rain and like thunder.
As the widening circle of death spread over Hiroshima, the Atomic Age was written into the history of Man.

We are a bigger, a stronger, a greater America than ever before. We have been victorious in six bitter wars in defense of our birthright. Let those who would destroy us read our history well and take warning.
